effect_entries.effect: Heals the user for ½ its max HP.  During a sandstorm, the healing is increased to ⅔.
effect_entries.short_effect: Heals the user for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ during a sandstorm.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.

The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores
more HP in a sandstorm.
